ygData.subject: Unicorn Horn
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, The other day My 45th bard was grouped with a wiz old friend. He said he ran into some unicorn and killed it a while back and that he got a unicorn
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings,

The other day My 45th bard was grouped with a wiz old friend. He said he ran
into some unicorn and killed it a while back and that he got a "unicorn
horn" but didnt know if it was special or not.

I told him give it to me ill do a quick test ( we were in lower guk so didnt
want to waste To much time).

Well first I fired up Invis with it and it was a wind instrament. So then I
pixie striked my self 3 times to watch the MR lower.

1. No instrament my mr loweres 8
2. Normal Wood Flute my mr lowers14 points
3. Unicorn horn my mr lowers 17 points ( average like 22% increase or
someting )

I also have a 50th necro and been bored with the game a bit . But my
question is, well no question. Is there anymore to this horn? I actually
have never heard of it and those are all the tests I did with it.

I just want to know if anyone else knows anymore about this horn. Possible
other uses for it and also what Purge spell is ( it has 5 charges)

Also this has no hand graphic on me wood elf bard. It does do the Piper
Animation though :)


Thanks ahead of time.

Tuldar Missednote 45th Wood Elf Bard. Tarew Marr
Nuldar Andhaka 50th Necromancer Human . Tarew Marr
